sentences.en: A carnation having pale petals bordered by a darker color.
sentences.cn: 他的扣洞上了一朵红色康乃馨.

sentences.en: All admission offer condolences the guests present a gift a carnation.
sentences.cn: 所有入场吊唁的来宾都获赠一支康乃馨.

sentences.en: And if you are a very lucky man, you may have the chance to meet your white lotus flower, then change her into a red rose, at last, and let her be a carnation.
sentences.cn: 但是，如果你是个足够幸运的男人，你有机会遇到你梦中的白莲，然后让她变成红玫瑰，最后再演变成一朵康乃馨。

sentences.en: Carnation is one of the most important cut flowers in the world.
sentences.cn: 香石竹是当代世界上最重要的切花品种之一.

sentences.en: Good wine is made from carnation sauce and sweet fermented spirits.
He had a white carnation in his buttonhole.
sentences.cn: 他在纽扣孔上佩了朵白色康乃馨.

sentences.en: He was wearing a carnation in his buttonhole.
sentences.cn: 他在扣眼里插了一朵康乃馨。

sentences.en: He was wearing a carnation in his lapel.
sentences.cn: 他的翻领里别着一枝康乃馨.

sentences.en: I gave my mom a carnation.
sentences.cn: 我送给我妈妈一朵康乃馨.

sentences.en: I got this diamond gift from the Carnation Nastle draw luck game.
sentences.cn: 既然得到了礼物,就自然要送出礼物,这才是平衡的美啊.

sentences.en: Miss Anna Jarvis's mother's favorite flower was the white carnation.
sentences.cn: 安娜·维丝小姐的母亲最喜爱的花是白色康乃馨.

sentences.en: The fine carnation of their cheeks is perennial as sunlight in the seventh heavens.
sentences.cn: 她们面颊的美丽的淡红色象七重天里的阳光始终辉煌灿烂.

sentences.en: The pink carnation: Wish mother to be beautiful young forever.
sentences.cn: 粉色康乃馨: 祝母亲永远美丽、年轻.

sentences.en: The red carnation: The warm love, wishes mother be in good health.
sentences.cn: 红色康乃馨: 热烈的爱 、 祝母亲健康长寿.

sentences.en: The white carnation: Thinking of to deceased mother.
sentences.cn: 白色康乃馨: 对已故母亲的怀念.

sentences.en: The yellow carnation: Grace of the thanks to the mother.
sentences.cn: 黄色康乃馨: 对母亲的感谢之恩.

trans.tran_cn: 康乃馨，麝香石竹，淡红色，肉色
trans.tran_en: a flower that smells sweet. Men often wear a carnation on their jacket on formal occasions.
